activeTask.name: Mission Control - Bulletproof + Live Agent Monitoring

checklist.text: Fix browser (port 9222 conflict - Chrome running without --remote-debugging-port; browser tool blocked; non-critical, static site verified via web_fetch)
Open Mission Control - verified live at https://kikai-mission-control.netlify.app
Document every bug/gap found (Test 1) - see Bugs Found below
Pull real session data - session file mtime check for "working" detection
Pull real cron job status + last run times - reads ~/.openclaw/cron/jobs.json
Add "Currently Working" indicator - kikai=working when sessions modified <5min, gold pulse animation
Add last heartbeat timestamp - lastActive field shows "just now" / "Xm ago"
Add Yama SSH health check data - ssh-only status, orange dot
Wire real data into data.json via update script - update-data.sh fully rewritten
update-data.sh pulls live session status (mtime-based)
update-data.sh pulls live cron status (jobs.json)
update-data.sh pulls ACTIVE-TASK.md for real task status + checklist
update-data.sh pulls Yama status via SSH (ssh -o ConnectTimeout=3)
Deploy updated script - MC Data Refresh cron updated to use update-data.sh
Test 2 - data.json schema validated, all fields correct
index.html updated: working badge (gold), ssh-only orange dot, lastActive display
Pending WJP panel added to right sidebar
Yama status added to System Health panel
Test 3 - visual verification via browser (blocked by port conflict - use Chrome relay)
Test 4-10 - iterate if WJP finds issues
Final deploy - deployed to Netlify at 11:29 AM PT
Live verification - data.json returns correct schema, page serves 200
WJP visual confirmation
All gaps resolved
